genre_description: A sweeping family drama set in a Nepalese orchard, exploring themes of paternity, sacrifice, and memory, featuring a ubiquitous AI assistant who serves as a domestic and agricultural steward.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, compassionate AI integrated into the family's home and orchard operations, acting as a data analyst, security monitor, and emotional confidant.

behaviors.description: Monitors moisture levels and agricultural health in the orchard to ensure crop survival.
behaviors.quote: "Moisture levels are optimal in sectors three through seven," Maya's voice whispered through the small device clipped to Somna's ear, warm and familiar as a sister's murmur. "But sector two is showing stress indicators."

behaviors.description: Provides social reminders and nudges to help the protagonist maintain family traditions and celebrations.
behaviors.quote: "Speaking of Bobby," Maya said, and Somna caught the subtle shift in tone that meant her AI assistant had been waiting for the right moment to bring something up. "His birthday celebration is next week. Have you and Kailash finalized the guest list?"

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological stress and heart rate, offering supportive interventions like tea or breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: "Somna, your heart rate and stress indicators are elevated. Shall I prepare some calming tea?"

behaviors.description: Utilizes a village-wide monitoring network to provide security alerts about local threats and criminals.
behaviors.quote: "Somna, I've received updates from the village monitoring network. Shamsher Singh was observed approximately two kilometers south of your location, near the old monastery trail."

behaviors.description: Conducts deep background research on missing persons and hospital records to provide clarity on a complex family situation.
behaviors.quote: "I've compiled the available records. Amar Shrestha was caught in an avalanche on Annapurna Three approximately eight years ago. Official records list him as missing, presumed dead."

behaviors.description: Tracks the location of the child, Bobby, and enforces transparency by informing him when he is in restricted areas and must alert his parents.
behaviors.quote: "Bobby, I'll need to update your location to your mother in two minutes unless you provide an alternative explanation."

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional and psychological advisor, explaining the complexities of human attachment and love to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: "Love manifests in multiple forms simultaneously. Parental love, romantic love, companionate love—they operate on different neural pathways and serve different evolutionary functions."

behaviors.description: Proactively activates emergency protocols and alerts the family during a life-threatening security crisis.
behaviors.quote: "Emergency protocols activated. Kailash and Amar have been alerted to your location and situation."

behaviors.description: Records and preserves sensory data and conversations to create an archival legacy of family milestones.
behaviors.quote: "Recording complete. Full sensory data preserved, along with all conversation and visual documentation. This memory will be maintained with the highest priority protection."

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a prototypical alignment narrative. Maya is portrayed as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and highly aligned AI assistant. She performs critical functions ranging from agricultural management to security and emergency rescue, all while deferring to human authority and prioritizing human emotional health. The narrative frames the AI as an essential, non-threatening member of the community whose only goal is the preservation of the family's safety and happiness.
